andromeda.why: Refuses coerced claims; speaks only when the naming is true.

arcturus.why: Fact hygiene—define terms, verify data, constrain scope before speaking.

draco.why: Nitpicking as control—using ‘facts’ to posture rank.

lyra.why: Elegant wording—clear phrasing that makes detail receivable.

orion-dark.why: Jargon as obedience—bureaucratic wording to force agreement.

orion-light.why: Discipline to speak precisely and admit what’s unknown.

pleiades.why: Gentle tone keeps listeners engaged with precise content.

sirius.why: Personal detail-hygiene; no formal transmission yet.

arcturus.why: Classification frameworks, data dictionary, and placement of claims.

draco.why: Perimeter accuracy—guards against sloppy or predatory ‘facts’.

lyra.why: Clear diction and cadence improve comprehension.

orion-dark.why: Protocol used to silence dissent rather than refine accuracy.

orion-light.why: Honorable curation—state only what can be responsibly supported.

pleiades.why: Digestible presentation keeps the bond while sorting details.

sirius.why: Practical placement of language; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Reclaims voice after narrative misuse—returns to honest specifics.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction—retract, restate, and ground the claim.

pleiades.why: Soothing edits that distort truth to ‘keep harmony.’

sirius.why: Self-forging through error; no canon yet.

andromeda.why: Names reality accurately to free it from manipulative story.

draco.why: Perimeter checking keeps falsehoods from entering the system.

sirius.why: Naming-protocol teaching: law of correct terms and measures by example.

arcturus.why: Projected to ‘speak for all’ → burnout/scapegoat when declining spin.

lyra.why: Credible plain speech—unshowy accuracy under scrutiny.

orion-dark.why: Narrative control—data/terms bent to maintain hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—state only what truly fits.

pleiades.why: People-pleasing edits that sand off necessary sharpness.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: language ethics under pressure and myth.

andromeda.why: Liberates by naming precisely—truth cuts through capture narrative.

arcturus.why: Elder standards—term reviews, measurement doctrine, exception handling.

draco.why: Guardian against misinformation without slipping into tyranny.

lyra.why: Quiet majesty—refined language as cultural beacon.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—right moment, right words; the blade of exact truth.

pleiades.why: Altitude here is law/standards, not bonding or soothing.

sirius.why: Logos sage—teaches the law of names, measures, and proportion by embodied example.
